department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: This contract is for delivered workshops and services to be used for career development, Basically will be teaching attendees how to conduct interviews', prepare for jobs, how to network, amongst other useful to career development skills.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement for Career Fair Workshops for Women

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4434460785-Doc4440903747
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4434460785
* **Publication Date:** 2024-02-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-27 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Turbo Proposal Number:** None
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Title:** Career Fair Workshops for Women for the Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Location:** Ontario (except NCR)
* **Trade Agreement:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Tender Status:** CLOSED

#### Tender Description

We are seeking a supplier for Career Fair Workshops for Women for the Department of National Defence (DND). Details of the tender can be found through Ariba Discovery. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 27, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

Christopher (il-lui / he-him) Casale
christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
